Title: Authorizes Kevin Donohue to take the civil service examination for the position of police officer for the town of Goshen
Summary: Authorizes Kevin Donohue to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of full-time police officer for the town of Goshen.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Kevin Donohue to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time police officer for the town of Goshen
